name: gohugo-theme-ananke-template-mod
description: Hugo Module based template repository for the [Ananke theme](https://github.com/theNewDynamic/gohugo-theme-ananke) for [GoHugo](https://gohugo.io/).

scripts.update: hugo mod get -u ./... && hugo mod tidy && git add go.mod go.sum && git commit -m 'build(deps): update go module'

author: Patrick Kollitsch <davidsneighbourdev+gh@gmail.com>
